description: Complete system overview documenting the core architecture, component relationships, and high-level data flow between the activity tracking, competition, achievement, and AI coaching systems

Detailed documentation of the proprietary scoring algorithms used for activity rings calculation, competition point distribution, and achievement progress tracking, including normalization methods for different health providers
Comprehensive documentation of data structures for competitions, activities, achievements, and social interactions, including their relationships and constraints
Detailed specification of the competition system including participant management, scoring rules, status transitions, and real-time leaderboard calculations
Technical documentation of the AI coaching system's context-aware response generation, fitness data integration, and subscription-based access controls
